title.label: It’s completely GREAT but I need some help.

content.label: Ok so I don’t always write reviews but this is kinda not a review, I’m just asking to make something easier. I’m at the dungeon of florrennum ok. So I’m on the swingy thing running on it to make it go higher but it just goes lower. It stresses me out way too much.
Best game I’ve played on the phone hands down

If you do no like games that you have to play for a while and grind to get your levels up don’t play this game but if you love the grinding the boss levels and great music then this is the game for you great fam 5/5.
The thing that pushes you down is too fast
It’s like the greatest game I’ve ever played on mobile phone i wish every person new about it

This game was SO much fun to play, when I was young my dad had it on his tablet and me and my sister played it SO much, we never finished it but we were young, but I got it on my iPad and it was AMAZING all though it had been so long sense I had played it, it had still been a great game that I enjoyed to play, if you need a fun game to play THSI IS THAT GAME!

title.label: I though this was a port from the n64

content.label: The game looks like final fantasy 7 and the controls are super responsive 9/10 ign
You made a EXTREMELY good game I give a five star review

Best mobile game I’ve ever played!  
Want another one just like it or part 2...??
One of the few good games on the App Store that not many people know about.

I was looking for a new phone game. And i hate micro transactions because i would rather just have an authentic gameplay experience. I was skeptical of this game just because it was free until I read the reviews. And they were right. You were right. First let me say that the narrative is well captivated by the graphics and the soundtrack and is seamlessly integrated into the gameplay. The skill cap is high. Everything about this game is so well designed. There are no micro transactions. You can pay 2$ to support the developers and remove infrequent ads once and for all. I paid 3$ instead so I collect double coins as well. Buy this game. Its worth it. The way they can create challenges out of simple game mechanics is genius and allows me to develop as a skillful player. I love this game.

title.label: Play it now! It’s super fun!

content.label: Play now!

I used to have this game back in 2018, when it came out. But no one ever talks about how deep it gets. I think that this game has been the best pvp, storyline, indie game I’ve ever played. Even though it doesn’t seem to have great graphics quality, yet that’s what makes it so much like Skyrim and nostalgic. I highly recommend this game and it’s an EASY 5 stars for me! 😃
Ok
Please Update The Game or Make Swordigo 2 Please

title.label: I love this game no matter how old I am

content.label: I played this game when I was about 10 and absolutely loved it and then played it again when I was 13 and still loved it, and now I’m playing it once more when I’m 15 and I can still spend my whole afternoon playing this game 10/10 would recommend just ignore the graphics
best game ever
Best game I’ve ever played in my life

This app is amazing. It may not have best graphic but it’s a great storyline, great controls, no need to be rich to play this game can do it free, and reminds me of old games that had meaning not just meaningless action but character development. Seems to be the only game on all iTunes App Store. Wish all games were like this.

This is a great game. It’s got lots of fun stuff like fight enemies, get equipment, solve puzzles and finish quests. I really like the layout and the design of the character although I wish you could change your character. There are a few minor problems. The enemies are very weak and easy to take out. Also once you have picked up new a weapon you don’t have your old one anymore which in my opinion is a problem. Besides those two little things this game is awesome and fun. Keep up the good work!

This is an amazing game with a simple but fun storyline gameplay is absolutely fluid everything is perfect in this game other than THE GOD DAMNED BATS WHY DO YOU HAVE THESE IN PLATFORMING SECTIONS LEGITIMATELY WHY

title.label: A good platform for a part 2

content.label:
This is one of the best games I’ve recently downloaded it was a trip down memory lane and I loved it though things can get to frestraiting at times it’s well worth it when you finally beat the last boss and have the satisfaction you want but to get good things from the guys store is ridiculous because now you have to grind to get the money to pay off your fees just so you can get your magic armor from billy bob but just to help people out with the sword prices.              
 
You can get pots from a place in a village and stack them over the house and using the power of double jump get to the other side where you will fight a relatively easy battle to get a decent sword.
Very entertaining and fun. I also really enjoy the graphics. 👍🏼👍🏼
It’s rare that I really remember old ipad games, but this one is my gold standard that I replay every year or two, and I’m still looking for a sequel!
We need a swordigo 2!!!!
This game is epic Please make a sequel
THIS IS THE BEST GAME I HAVE EVER PLAYED, IM BEGGING FOR A PART 2!!
Tons of fun. I love simple rpg side scrollers and this one is awesome! Worth supporting the developer for sure!

I’m only here to try and convince game makers to also come up with easier games for us seniors 😁. Those with agility issues. Fewer spiders, longer platforms to maneuver in. Seriously. I really like this game but it’s a bit intense for us slooooww moooovers. No bursting bubbles and jewels please.

First, is because it’s got legend of Zelda theme and I love that kind of stuff. Second, is because who could say no to a game like this. If you only play trash mobile games play this and you will love it. I rate it 6/5

Thank you a lot for this game it is the best game I’ve played since like so long. The game was so fun I had a great experience with it. I’m going back to playing it tomorrow. Very good bosses and challenging levels. THANK YOU Again! Five off the bat. No arguments except the first boss when you get the first shard of the megasword was too easy. it is so much fun. Please don’t make us spawn at the beginning it is annoying but that aside it’s fun.Never boring. Ignore the dislikes this is the best.

title.label: Im so happy my friend recommended this

content.label: I enjoy rpg games and story games and this is one of my favorite games i love the design i love the spells the mageblade looks amazing the trinkets were so fun to find the trinkets  the bosses are hard and cool  so i recommend this to people who are searching for a game that makes you happy with every accomplishment and achievement then swordigo could be a game to enjoy

Overall fun game to play except I deleted it twice. It’s really fun but it’s stupid how hard some of the little levels are. I’m on the last piece of the mage blade and I can’t get past this last part. I’ve been stuck on it for about a week now and this is the same level that made me delete the game before. You should make it to where the players can adjust the difficulty because mine is at medium and I’m more of an easy kind of guy.
I beat the game but it’s still really fun but they should make a longer story in a new game like sword go 2
Please make it so you can customize your character

name.label: The Farm Fool on the Hill

content.label: SWORDIGO 2!!! PLEEEEEEEEASE
The graphics are beautiful. The game mechanics are well thought out. The challenge factor is perfect. The story doesn’t get in the way of the game
Incredibly entertaining, possibly the best side scroller on the iPhone

This game is by far the best free mobile game out there. I played this about a year ago, but I never finished, so I wanted to give it a try. And although the graphics aren’t ‘The Last of Us,’ the gameplay is very fun and I recommend it. One thing though (I have no idea if this still exists) but when I played it long ago and got to the old castle part, in the boss fight, I died when I had the key. When I went back it was gone and I couldn’t find it again. Is this a bug?
Great fun. Classic sword fantasy platformer.  Expansive and interesting.  Reminded me of classic PS2 game Maximo . Try it. You’ll like it. This game deserves a 5 Star rating.

I rarely truly enjoy games on my phone but this game is the exception. I really like this one. It was entertaining and simple yet had some challenging aspects. Overall it was a really great phone game. I 100%ed it in about 3 days, so I wish the storyline was a little longer. But definitely a 5 star experience!

title.label: I don’t like the hot boxes

content.label: It is really and I mean really weird with the bit boxes for me and every time you look like you hit something it doesn’t then the enemy hits you next when your obviously far enough away from it and the play forms are really, really, really bad especially in the second boss fight in the Fire Chamber 2nd Form
I love it because it is a Half 3D half 2D and it is a Adventure to stop corruption from takeoff over the world
This was one of the best games I have ever played in the App Store I hope they put more games like this.

title.label: THANK YOU thank you thank you developers

content.label: Let me start off by saying that I never give reviews on apps. I absolutely love this game. I found it a few years ago and loved it so much but forgot about it after a few years. I am so happy that it is still here and I was so surprised that everything was free because this is an amazing game. I am so thankful for this game because it is the only game that I can play for hours and not het tired of. I wish the graphics were a little better and the storyline wasn’t as repetitive but honestly I could care less about that stuff. This game is already an absolute gem and beyond perfect the way it is now. Thank you so much for making this game developers, lots of love to you guys. I am one of the lucky people who were able to find this hidden gem. If anyone by any chance is reading this review, please install this game!!!! You will not regret it.

Great game, good puzzle solving and mechanics.  Free version is full featured, just has an ad every so often, but I liked it enough to pay to remove ads in order to support the developer.  I’ve always said that I’m willing to pay for a good quality game.  Hate the freemium games that have become prevalent.
The story is great and the puzzles are challenging! There’s so many places to explore! The controls are perfect!
This is the best mobile game Sence infinity blade 3
